duties_responsibilities.duty: Completes applications to appropriate carriers. Follows up to ensure timely receipt of quotations and policies. Orders and issues binders, certificates, policies, endorsements and other related items; verifies their accuracy; forwards them to client with appropriate correspondence.
Prepares summaries of insurance. Reviews audits policies, verifies accuracy and facilitates corrections.
Verifies policy and policy change information, facilitating corrections when necessary. Identifies exposure to loss and recommends appropriate coverages.
Assists clients in submitting first reports of claims, facilitates prompt response from carrier staff and follows up on claims status according to agency procedures.

education_certification.credential: Associates or College degree preferred. Active Property and Casualty License required.
